messages.content: Welcome back! Here's what has been happening since you were last here:

actions.title: Moderation response times increasing
actions.description: Average response time has increased to 4.2 hours (up 35% from last week).

actions.title: @timec posting suspicious links
actions.description: User has posted 8 external links in the past hour across #general and #help channels. Community members are reporting spam.

actions.title: Engagement spike in #feature-requests
actions.description: Discussion about dark mode has generated 47 replies and 23 upvotes. Sarah Chen and Mike Rodriguez are leading productive conversations.

message.content: Learn more about the moderation response times

messages.content: Your moderation response times are increasing due to a higher volume of reports and limited moderator availability during peak hours.
I recommend adding a new moderator. Let me find the best candidates for you.

message.content: Assign Discord role to Alex Thompson

props.message: I've assigned the Discord role to Sarah Chen. Shall I send an announcement to the community?

message.content: Assign Discord role to Sarah Chen

messages.content: I can see you have an upcoming meeting with your manager, Leo Tan.

toastTriggers.triggerText: I've just sent a community health report to Leo ahead of the meeting.
toastTriggers.toastMessage: Community health report emailed to Leo Tan

messages.content: I've just sent a community health report to Leo ahead of the meeting.

props.reportContent: Community health report covering moderation issues, engagement metrics, and upcoming initiatives

message.content: Thanks, what else should I know about?
Looks good! What else should I know about?

messages.content: Feature X is being discussed a lot in the community lately. There's been a 40% increase in mentions and the sentiment is overwhelmingly positive. Maybe it's time to do a Twitter Spaces to dive deeper into this topic?

message.content: Awesome! Let's do it! Ping my team in Slack so they know about it.

toastTriggers.triggerText: Perfect! I've scheduled a Twitter Spaces for Feature X discussion. Here are the details:
toastTriggers.toastMessage: Twitter Spaces scheduled: Feature X discussion in 24 hours

messages.content: Perfect! I've scheduled a Twitter Spaces for Feature X discussion. Here are the details:
I've also pinged @kyleh and @jason in Slack to join as co-hosts. You are on a roll! Need anything else?

message.content: Yes, I want to reward my top contributors in this community this week.

messages.content: I've analysed recent community contributions across GitHub, Discord, and Telegram. Here are the top contributors who deserve recognition for their valuable work:

contributors.name: Sarah Chen
contributors.contribution: Led Feature X discussions and helped 24 community members

contributors.name: Mike Rodriguez
contributors.contribution: Submitted 3 PRs improving smart contract security

contributors.name: Alex Thompson
contributors.contribution: Provided technical support and documentation improvements

props.reason: For leading productive Feature X discussions

messages.content: I've sent the rewards to the recipients. Anything else you need?

message.content: I've added a new document called Summer Marketing Campaign, please add to your brain

messages.content: Let me sync it to update my knowledge base.
All done! I have knowledge of your Summer Marketing Campaign. Looks awesome!
Yeah, I know. I'm a genius. See you soon! ðŸ˜˜
